sentences.sContent: What do you do after being a spy? Do you sell insurance? And how do you get a new career when your resumé is blank?
sentences.sContent_eng: What do you do after being a spy? Do you sell insurance? And how do you get a new career when your resumé is blank?
sentences.sCn: 在特工之后你又该做些什么呢？卖保险？当你的履历档案完全是空白时，你怎样才能得到一份新工作呢？
